name: Pixel Blitz - Impossible Runner
summary:
Jump and fly your way through danger in this rhythm-based action game!

Something exciting and new in the action game genre!  Pixel Blitz will seriously challenge your skills and reflexes!

The spikes and obstacles come fast. Avoid them at all cost, while unlocking new challenges along the way.

Prepare for a near impossible challenge in the interactive and colorful world of Pixel Blitz. 

**** ALL LEVELS UNLOCKED ****

GAME FEATURES
• Rhythm-based Action Gameplay! 
• One touch game play
• Simple game mechanics 
• Lots of levels with original soundtracks!
• Bright and colorful levels
• All levels unlocked
• No ads (ever)!
• Challenge yourself with near impossible levels

*** IMPORTANT ***
This game is very challenging ... it requires true skill to master.
